observations: CRITICAL BUG: The GetPageTemplates API endpoint (GET /API/PersonaBar/Templates/GetPageTemplates) consistently returns HTTP 500 Internal Server Error, completely blocking Template List Display functionality.
The Page Templates UI loads correctly - header, search box, and Add Template button are all visible and accessible.
The Add Template button is functional and displays appropriate message when clicked.
The error handling in the UI correctly catches the API failure and displays user-friendly error message.
Based on code review (TemplatesController.cs), the GetPageTemplates method calls PageTemplateController.Instance.GetTemplates() which appears to have a server-side issue.
The issue persists across page refreshes and multiple navigation attempts, indicating a persistent server-side bug rather than transient network issue.

All Template List Display features are blocked by this API failure: list view, thumbnails, status indicators, publish dates, child counts, hierarchical view, action buttons, search, and hover previews.
